reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 273/91: AMALGAMATED TOWN - WARD SYSTEM FOR THE HYDRO-ELECTRIC POWER COMMISSION
reg_info.reg_name_text: AMALGAMATED TOWN — WARD SYSTEM FOR THE HYDRO-ELECTRIC POWER COMMISSION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 273/91: AMALGAMATED TOWN - WARD SYSTEM FOR THE HYDRO-ELECTRIC POWER COMMISSION
reg_info.act_under: County of Simcoe Act, 1993   Loi de 1993 sur le comté de Simcoe

content.content: 1. Three wards are hereby created in the Amalgamated Town for the election of members to the hydro-electric power commission of the Amalgamated Town. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Three wards are hereby created in the Amalgamated Town for the election of members to the hydro-electric power commission of the Amalgamated Town. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) Ward 1 consists of the area of the Town of Alliston as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 2 (1). (2) Two members of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 1. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Ward 1 consists of the area of the Town of Alliston as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 2 (1).

(2) Two members of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 1. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. (1) Ward 2 consists of the area of the Village of Beeton as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 3 (1). (2) One member of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 2. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) Ward 2 consists of the area of the Village of Beeton as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 3 (1).

(2) One member of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 2. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. (1) Ward 3 consists of the area of the Village of Tottenham as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 4 (1). (2) One member of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 3. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) Ward 3 consists of the area of the Village of Tottenham as it existed on the 31st day of December, 1990. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 4 (1).

(2) One member of the hydro-electric power commission shall be elected from ward 3. O.Reg. 273/91, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 5. (1) A person is qualified to be elected or to hold office as a member of the hydro-electric power commission representing a ward, if, in addition to holding all other qualifications for the office, the person is a qualified elector under the Municipal Elections Act in the ward. O. Reg. 273/91, s. 5 (1). (2) A member of the hydro-electric power commission representing a ward is disqualified from holding that office, if at any time during the term of office of that member, he or she is not a resident in the ward, the owner or tenant of land in the ward or the spouse or same-sex partner of an owner or tenant of land in the ward. O. Reg. 273/91, s. 5 (2); O. Reg. 98/00, s. 1 (1). (3) In this section, “owner or tenant” and “resident” have the same meanings as in the Municipal Elections Act, 1996; “same-sex partner” and “spouse” have the same meanings as in the Municipal Act.  O. Reg. 98/00, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
5. (1) A person is qualified to be elected or to hold office as a member of the hydro-electric power commission representing a ward, if, in addition to holding all other qualifications for the office, the person is a qualified elector under the Municipal Elections Act in the ward. O. Reg. 273/91, s. 5 (1).

(2) A member of the hydro-electric power commission representing a ward is disqualified from holding that office, if at any time during the term of office of that member, he or she is not a resident in the ward, the owner or tenant of land in the ward or the spouse or same-sex partner of an owner or tenant of land in the ward. O. Reg. 273/91, s. 5 (2); O. Reg. 98/00, s. 1 (1).

(3) In this section,

“owner or tenant” and “resident” have the same meanings as in the Municipal Elections Act, 1996;

“same-sex partner” and “spouse” have the same meanings as in the Municipal Act. O. Reg. 98/00, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 273/91, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 273/91, s. 6.
